ivardefs.name: comorbidity_
ivardefs.desc: Comorbidity (concurrent condition) or co-infection as part of the indication.

ivardefs.name: diseaseStatus
ivardefs.desc: The status of the disease or symptom for which the indication applies.

ivardefs.name: diseaseSymptomProcedure
ivardefs.desc: The disease, symptom or procedure that is the indication for treatment.

ivardefs.name: duration
ivardefs.desc: Timing or duration information as part of the indication.

ivardefs.name: intendedEffect
ivardefs.desc: The intended effect, aim or strategy to be achieved by the indication.

ivardefs.name: otherTherapy_
ivardefs.desc: Information about the use of the medicinal product in relation to other therapies described as part of the indication.

ivardefs.name: population_
ivardefs.desc: The population group to which this applies.

ivardefs.name: subject_
ivardefs.desc: The medication for which this is an indication.

ivardefs.name: undesirableEffect_
ivardefs.desc: Describe the undesirable effects of the medicinal product.
